Package subsystem.interbank.creditCard

Class CreditCardLayer

java.lang.Object
subsystem.interbank.creditCard.CreditCardLayer
public class CreditCardLayer extends Object
The CreditCardLayer class provides access to credit card data stored in a JSON format, retrieved from a database table. It facilitates operations related to credit card information, including querying balances, changing balances, and retrieving credit card details.

    • getInstance

      public static CreditCardLayer getInstance()
      Get the singleton instance of the CreditCardLayer class.
      Returns:
      The instance of the CreditCardLayer.

    • getCreditCardList

      public List<CreditCard> getCreditCardList()
      Get a list of all credit cards stored in the JSON data.
      Returns:
      A list of CreditCard objects representing the credit cards.

    • getCreditCardByCardNumber

      public CreditCard getCreditCardByCardNumber(String cardNumber)
      Get a credit card by its card number.
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - The card number of the credit card to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The CreditCard object representing the credit card with the given card number, or null if no credit card with the provided card number is found.

    • getCreditCardByCardId

      public CreditCard getCreditCardByCardId(Integer cardId)
      Get a credit card by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      cardId - The ID of the credit card to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The CreditCard object representing the credit card with the given ID, or null if no credit card with the provided ID is found.

    • getBalance

      public Double getBalance(String cardNumber)
      Get the balance of a credit card by its card number.
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - The card number of the credit card for which to retrieve the balance.
      Returns:
      The balance of the credit card with the given card number, or -1 if no credit card with the provided card number is found.

    • resetBalance

      public int resetBalance(String cardNumber)
      Reset the balance of a credit card to a predefined value.
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - The card number of the credit card for which to reset the balance.
      Returns:
      0 if the balance reset is successful, -1 otherwise.

    • changeCardBalance

      public Integer changeCardBalance(CreditCard card, Double price, boolean isPay)
      Change the balance of a credit card based on a transaction.
      Parameters:
      card - The CreditCard object for which to change the balance.
      price - The amount to change the balance by.
      isPay - Whether the transaction is a payment (true) or a receive (false).
      Returns:
      The ID of the credit card if the balance change is successful, -1 otherwise.
